location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File VO-E/27 KING'S REGULATIONS. - Issue & Sale of''

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-7; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding the issue and sale of Kingâ€™s Regulations. The main correspondence is between the Political Agency, Bahrain, the British Residency, Bahrain, the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), and the Foreign Office.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
